fields.name: Mission Planning
fields.description: Checklists, risk assessments, and briefing templates.

fields.name: Payloads
fields.description: Guides for EO/IR, LiDAR, mapping pods, and integrations.

fields.title: Pre-flight Mission Brief Template
fields.summary: Checklist-driven mission brief capturing crew, risk, and communication plans.
fields.body:
## Mission Brief Template

1. Objectives & success criteria
2. Airspace coordination / NOTAMs
3. Weather window & alternates
4. Crew roles, call signs, and comm plan
5. Risk actions & abort criteria

fields.title: EO/IR Sensor Warm-Up Checklist
fields.summary: Process to stabilize cooled sensors before deployment.
fields.body:
1. Connect payload power and confirm firmware version.
2. Allow 8-10 minutes for cooler warm-up.
3. Calibrate gimbal limits and verify video stream.
4. Run NUC (non-uniformity correction) prior to launch.
